SqlMap.sql: UPDATE ZB_ZBGL_JT6 SET FAULT_NOTICE_STATUS = '#STATUS_DRAFT#', UPDATE_TIME = TO_DATE('#updateTime#', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), RDP_IDX = '#rdpIDX#', REPAIR_CLASS = '#REPAIRCLASS#' WHERE FAULT_NOTICE_STATUS = '#STATUS_INIT#' AND RECORD_STATUS = #NO_DELETE# AND TRAIN_TYPE_SHORTNAME = '#trainTypeShortName#' AND TRAIN_NO = '#trainNo#' and idx not in( select a.JT6_IDX from ZB_ZBGL_JT6_Exception a where a.RECORD_STATUS = 0 )

UPDATE ZB_ZBGL_JT6 SET UPDATE_TIME = TO_DATE('#updateTime#', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), REV_PERSON_ID = #revPersonId#, REV_PERSON_NAME = '#revPersonName#', REV_TIME = TO_DATE('#revTime#', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), REV_ORGID = #revOrgID#, REV_ORGNAME = '#revOrgName#', REV_ORGSEQ = '#revOrgSeq#', FAULT_NOTICE_STATUS = '#STATUS_OPEN#' WHERE IDX IN #IDXS#

UPDATE ZB_ZBGL_JT6 SET UPDATE_TIME = TO_DATE('#updateTime#', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), REV_PERSON_ID = #revPersonId#, REV_PERSON_NAME = '#revPersonName#', REV_TIME = TO_DATE('#revTime#', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), FAULT_NOTICE_STATUS = '#STATUS_OPEN#' WHERE IDX IN #IDXS#

UPDATE ZB_ZBGL_JT6 SET UPDATE_TIME = TO_DATE('#updateTime#', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), METHOD_DESC = '#methodDesc#', REPAIR_RESULT = #repairResult#, REPAIR_DESC = '#repairDesc#', HANDLE_PERSON_ID = #handlePersonId#, HANDLE_PERSON_NAME = '#handlePersonName#', HANDLE_TIME = TO_DATE('#handleTime#', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), HANDLE_SITEID = '#handleSiteID#', HANDLE_SITENAME = '#handleSiteName#', FAULT_NOTICE_STATUS = '#STATUS_OVER#', PROFESSIONAL_TYPE_IDX = '#professionalTypeIdx#', PROFESSIONAL_TYPE_NAME = '#professionalTypeName#', PROFESSIONAL_TYPE_SEQ = '#professionalTypeSeq#', FAULT_FIX_FULLNAME = '#faultFixFullName#', Repair_Emp_ID = '#repairEmpID#', Repair_Emp = '#repairEmp#', Fault_Reason = '#faultReason#' WHERE IDX IN #IDXS#

UPDATE ZB_ZBGL_JT6 SET UPDATE_TIME = TO_DATE('#updateTime#', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), REV_PERSON_ID = null, REV_PERSON_NAME = '', REV_TIME = null, REV_ORGID = null, REV_ORGNAME = '', REV_ORGSEQ = '', FAULT_NOTICE_STATUS = '#STATUS_DRAFT#' WHERE IDX IN #IDXS#

UPDATE ZB_ZBGL_JT6 SET UPDATE_TIME = TO_DATE('#updateTime#', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), REV_PERSON_ID = null, REV_PERSON_NAME = '', REV_TIME = null, FAULT_NOTICE_STATUS = '#STATUS_DRAFT#' WHERE IDX IN #IDXS#
UPDATE ZB_ZBGL_JT6 SET UPDATE_TIME = TO_DATE('#updateTime#', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), REV_ORGID = #revOrgID#, REV_ORGNAME = '#revOrgName#', REV_ORGSEQ = '#revOrgSeq#' WHERE IDX IN #IDXS#

select gztp.fault_type_key as "typeKey", gztp.fault_type_value as "typeValue", gztp.counts as "counts" from ( select t.fault_type_key , t.fault_type_value ,e.sortno, count(1) counts from K_GZTP t inner join EOS_DICT_ENTRY e on e.dicttypeid = 'FAULT_TYPE' and e.dictid = t.fault_type_key where t.record_status = 0 and t.fault_type_key is not null and t.fault_type_value is not null group by t.fault_type_key , t.fault_type_value , e.sortno ) gztp order by gztp.sortno

select m.mon as "mon", nvl(p.counts,0) as "planCounts", nvl(r.counts,0) as "realCounts" from ( select lpad(level,2,0) as mon from dual connect by level<13 ) m left join ( select to_char(t.plan_start_date,'MM') as mon,count(1) as counts from SCDD_Train_Enforce_Plan_Detail t where t.record_status = 0 and to_char(t.plan_start_date,'yyyy') = '#year#' group by to_char(t.plan_start_date,'MM') ) p on m.mon = p.mon left join ( select to_char(t.plan_begin_time,'MM') as mon , count(1) as counts from JXGC_Train_Work_Plan t where t.record_status = 0 and to_char(t.plan_begin_time,'yyyy') = '#year#' and t.Work_Plan_Status <> 'TERMINATED' group by to_char(t.plan_begin_time,'MM') ) r on m.mon = r.mon order by m.mon

( select count(1) as "counts" from JXGC_Train_Work_Plan p where p.record_status = 0 and p.work_plan_status = 'COMPLETE' ) union all ( select count(1) as "counts" from JXGC_Train_Work_Plan p where p.record_status = 0 and p.work_plan_status = 'COMPLETE' and to_char(p.plan_begin_time,'yyyy') = #year# ) union all ( select count(1) as "counts" from SCDD_Train_Enforce_Plan_Detail d where d.record_status = 0 and to_char(d.plan_start_date,'yyyy') = #year# )
